bug.short_desc: Border type "Shadow" seems not to work anymore in beta1

long_desc.thetext:
I tried to use the bordertype Shadow, but it seems to be broklen, also the 0.7 beta1 example for the listviews fails because of this: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/0.7-beta1/sample/html/test/ListView_1.html
Here is the error message my firefox shows: Error: [Exception... "'Error: Error in property border of class qx.ui.listview.ListView in method setBorder with incoming value 'shadow': Is invalid!' when calling method: [nsIDOMEventListener::handleEvent]" nsresult: "0x8057001c (NS_ERROR_XPC_JS_THREW_JS_OBJECT)" location: "<unknown>" data: no]
I tested it with my firefox 2.0, I have no other browser for testing it here (and I think it's not browser specific)

There seems to be another problem with borders, too:
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/0.7-beta1/sample/html/test/Font_1.html
Error: [Exception... "'Error: Error in property border of class qx.ui.layout.CanvasLayout in method setBorder with incoming value '1px solid red': Is invalid!' when calling method: [nsIDOMEventListener::handleEvent]" nsresult: "0x8057001c (NS_ERROR_XPC_JS_THREW_JS_OBJECT)" location: "<unknown>" data: no]

thanks, both issues have been fixed in svn.
The border "shadow" has been renamed to "dark-shadow"
